mapper.select: select m.member_id, m.member_identification, i.inqb_id, i.inqb_title , i.inqb_content, i.inqb_date, i.inqb_complete from tbl_inquireboard i join tbl_member m on i.member_id=m.member_id and inqb_id = #{inqbId}

select m.member_id, m.member_identification, i.inqb_id, i.inqb_title , i.inqb_content, i.inqb_date, i.inqb_complete from tbl_inquireboard i join tbl_member m on m.member_id=i.member_id order by i.inqb_id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount}
select i.inqb_id, a.ansb_id, a.ansb_title, a.ansb_content,a.ansb_date from tbl_answerboard a join tbl_inquireboard i on a.inqb_id= i.inqb_id and i.inqb_id = #{inqbId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_answerboard (ansb_id, inqb_id, ansb_title, ansb_content, ansb_date) values (#{ansbId}, #{inqbId},#{ansbTitle}, #{ansbContent}, #{ansbDate})
